alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 14 at 1:49AM CDT until August 15 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Platte River near Agency affecting Buchanan County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Platte River near Agency. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low-lying areas east of Agency begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 20.3 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
